meanings.definition: A person or company that sends mail.
meanings.sent1: The mailer delivered letters to all the houses in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The mailer company ensures that packages reach their destinations on time.
meanings.sent3: The mailer accidentally sent a letter to the wrong address, causing a mix-up.
meanings.sent4: She was like a diligent mailer, always making sure messages were delivered promptly.
meanings.sent5: The mailer's job is crucial for keeping communication flowing smoothly.

meanings.definition: A piece of software used for sending email.
meanings.sent1: I use the mailer to send important emails to my colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The new mailer has improved features for organizing and managing emails.
meanings.sent3: The mailer software made a funny sound every time a message was sent.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced across the keyboard as she worked with the mailer program.
meanings.sent5: The mailer allows users to communicate instantly with people around the world.

meanings.definition: A container or envelope used for mailing items.
meanings.sent1: She placed the fragile item in the mailer to protect it during shipping.
meanings.sent2: The mailer was securely sealed to prevent any damage to the contents.
meanings.sent3: The colorful mailer stood out among the other plain envelopes in the mailbox.
meanings.sent4: The mailer embraced the gift inside, keeping it safe until it reached its destination.
meanings.sent5: The mailer was lightweight yet sturdy, perfect for sending small packages.
